publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 148
ab.l: Maḥtav b́erijiź Teńriǵa haleĺ oḥujuz H-ɣa ol ḱokĺar- d́ań maḥtav b́erijiź anar bijik ḱokĺard́ań.

Maḥtav b́erijiź
anar bar malʾaḫlary maḥtav b́erijiź anar bar č́eriv́ĺari.
Maḥtav b́erijiź anar qujaš da aj maḥtav b́erijiź Teńriǵa bar jaryḥ julduzlar.
Maḥtav b́erijiź Teńriǵa qatlary ol ḱokĺarniń da ol suvlar ki joɣarraḥ ol ḱokĺard́ań.
Maḥtav b́erijiź šemińa H-nyn ki ol bujurdu da jaratyldy- lar.
Da turɣuzdu alarny dunjadan dunjaɣa dejiń ŕesim b́erdi da ašmejdir.
Maḥtav b́erijiź H-ɣa ol jerd́ań azdaɣalar da bar darja- lar.
Ot da buz qar da t́ut́uń jel da tavul qyladyr śoźuń.
Ol tavlar da bar qajalar jemiš aɣačy da bar ereźĺar.
Ol kijik da bar ol tuvar qurt da qanatly quš.
Bijĺari jerniń da bar ümḿat́- ĺar aɣalyḥlar da bar t́oŕačiĺari jerniń.
Igit́ĺar daɣy boj qyzlar qartlar jaš ulanlar byla.
Maḥtav b́erirĺar šemińa H-nyn ki kiptir šemi anyn jalɣyznyn maḥtav b́erirĺar anar jer üśt́uńa da ḱokĺard́a.
Da ḱot́urd́u d́ev́ĺatiń ulusunun maḥtav bar ḥasid́ĺarińa ulanlaryna Jiśraʾeĺniń ulus ki juvuḥ- tur anar haleĺ oḥujuz Teńriǵa.
